title: Three 'Must Haves' For Farm Equipment Dealers Just Getting Into Precision Equipment

tasks.task: Provide technical support and training for precision agriculture equipment
subtasks: Understand customer needs and tailor solutions
Train customers on proper equipment usage and new technologies
Collaborate closely with growers to optimize farm operations

tasks.task: Manage elite Precision Ag dealer program
subtasks: Provide ongoing training and resources to dealers
Facilitate quicker service and support for dealers
Promote elite dealers through marketing opportunities
Leverage dealer network for customer education and support
